程序包 org.hibernate.validator.internal.xml

Classes for parsing of Bean Validation XML configuration files.

请参阅: 说明

  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    BootstrapConfigurationImpl
    Wrapper class for the bootstrap parameters defined in validation.xml
    ContainerElementTypePath
    The path to a container element type.
    MappingXmlParser
    XML parser for validation-mapping files.
    NamespaceNormalizingXMLEventReaderDelegate
    An XML EventReaderDelegate designed to normalize the XML namespaces.
    ValidationBootstrapParameters  
    ValidationXmlParser
    Parser for validation.xml using JAXB.
    XmlParserHelper
    Provides common functionality used within the different XML descriptor parsers.
  • 枚举概要 
    枚举 说明
    LocalNamespace
    Bean Validation namespaces reference.
